member.name: IWICMetadataBlockReader.GetContainerFormat
member.summary: Retrieves the container format of the decoder.
member.param: The container format of the decoder. The native container format GUIDs are listed in WIC GUIDs and CLSIDs.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataBlockReader.GetCount
member.summary: Retrieves the number of top level metadata blocks.
member.param: When this method returns, contains the number of top level metadata blocks.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataBlockReader.GetEnumerator
member.summary: Retrieves an enumeration of objects representing each of the top level metadata blocks.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to an enumeration of objects.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataBlockReader.GetReaderByIndex
member.summary: Retrieves an for a specified top level metadata block.
member.param: The index of the desired top level metadata block to retrieve.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the specified by nIndex.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICMetadataBlockReader
member.summary: Exposes methods that provide access to all of the codec's top level metadata blocks.
